law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 15A.372, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 283, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts as KRS 15A.372, ch. 318, sec. 205, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 317, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Trial board for hearings on charges against commissioned employees -- Right to hearing -- Appeals.
